title: FS - 4 graded T206s - Chase, Doyle, Elberfeld
author: TistaT202

posts.post_title: FS - 4 graded T206s - Chase, Doyle, Elberfeld
posts.post_content:
Just got my REA invoice, so looking for some funds. The following are FS only.  Prices include S/H in the US.  If you don't like the price, feel free to make an offer.  You will not insult me, and the worst I can say is no.  PP F&F preferred for payment.  Please let me know if you would like more pics of anything.  First come, first served.  Thanks, Mike

T206 SC 350/30 Kid Elberfeld Wash Fielding - PSA 3(MK).  Looks like the red ink spill occurred after printing...does not fluoresce under black light for what it's worth.  Looks to also have a speck of stray yellow ink above the S on the reverse.  Looking for $150 obo.

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2r1uTpw][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54483247808_5cfebf83fb.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2r1uTpw]Untitled[/url] [url=https://flic.kr/p/2r1vi8q][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54483327610_26126c7072.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2r1vi8q]Untitled[/url]

T206 P350 Hal Chase Throwing Dark Cap PSA 3(MC) - Very cool miscut back from left to right with the hint of another back showing on the right side.  Looking for $225 obo

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2r1tFRS][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54483013856_65afbaa31d.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2r1tFRS]Untitled[/url] [url=https://flic.kr/p/2r1tGkx][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54483015461_9db4ae906b.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2r1tGkx]Untitled[/url]

T206 P350-460 Hal Chase Holding Trophy - SGC 30 - Looking for $old

T206 P350 Joe Doyle NY Hands Above Head - PSA 2 - Looking for $old
bump...2 cards sold, 2 remain.  thanks, Mike
one final bump before eBay.  Thanks, Mike
